entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [REQ] Simplified way to consume async code anywhere with new methods on Task class #83113
  • Investigate why crossgen works slower with TieredCompilation/PGO #83112
    8.0.0
  • Optimize GC series for cases where all instance fields could be represented as a single serie #83111
  • Http/Quic tests are crashing on Windows #83110
  • Segregate the register iterations based on intType/floatType #83109
  • [wasm] Build - better integrate with `publish` #83108
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently on Alpine 3.17 #83101
    Future
  • Changed behavior of DependencyContext.Default.RuntimeLibraries? #83097
  • JsonSerializerOptions should provide explicit control over chained IJsonTypeInfoResolvers #83095
    8.0.0
  • BackgroundService StopAsync not triggering when Shutdown in .NET 7 #83093
  • JIT: gtGetStructHandleIfPresent may return SIMD handles that normalize (via `impNormStructType`) to wrong types #83091
  • ILLink analyzer produces both IL3000 and IL3002 for AssemblyName.CodeBase method #83088
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json roundtrips Stack<T> instances in reverse order #83086
    Future
  • Do I need to limit GC Heap size when deploying to Kubernetes with windows containers? #83081
  • Test failure global::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx1.Program.RoundToNearestIntegerSingle() #83075
  • Testing Mono runtime and Testing Libraries failed on Windows X64 #83074
  • Cannot connect NamedPipeClientStream later when constructing it with an existing pipe handle #83073
  • Cannot set ReadMode after creating a NamedPipeClientStream instance #83072
  • HostFxr loading assembly for each call to load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer #83071
  • 💾 Bringing the size of Native AOT Hello World under 1.44 MB #83069
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: TryParseExplicit/ParseExplicit #83058
  • Feature: Add a diagnostics IPC command to dynamically emit perfmap files #83056
    8.0.0

Closed

  • In .NET 7 RuntimeHelpers.PrepareMethod no longer jits a method #83042
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedWindowsPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue #82885
    8.0.0
  • AV during System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests on windows x86 #83098
  • [API Proposal]: Add InvalidEnumArgumentException.ThrowIfNotDefined #83107
  • Assert in System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_* #70981
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArrayPool based MemoryStream #83105
  • mono-6.12.0.122: seems to not respect --sysconfdir #83099
  • consider running all pipelines on eng/ updates #82436
  • [API Proposal]: Add structural equality and order comparison for common collections #77209
    8.0.0
  • RequiredAttribute add an AllowDefault property #28694
    Future
  • MaxDepth option and ReferenceHandler.IgnoreCycles Does not behave the same as Json.net when maxdepth is exceeded #83025
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 10 Regressions on 2/20/2023 2:00:07 PM #82541
  • Regressions in System.Hashing.GetStringHashCode #82243
    8.0.0
  • Fail to run Q# program because an dotnet runtime error #81679
  • Hello world #83070
  • Mutex constructor always outputs createdNew param as true on Ubuntu #83014
  • [NativeAOT] Usages of generic `EqualityComparer.Default` have cctor init checks for primitives #81592
    8.0.0
  • Quic tests are failing on macOS #83009
    8.0.0
  • Different behavior of string.StartsWith under Net481 and Net7.0 #83049
  • Add exchange type for a scheduler #20070
    Future
  • Proposal: ValueTask.WhenAll #23625
    Future
  • System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry Open method sometimes throws InvalidDataException in ZIP files over 4.2GB #79628

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ConsoleKey.None and ConsoleModifiers.None #83114
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update SourceBuild image to be our Centos 8 Stream image. #83106
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.5 #83103
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.16 #83102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [7.0] Fix superpmi_collect-setup.py helix images to use floating versions instead #83100
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [QUIC] Updated generated interop files from msquic #83092
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Support converting OR(condition, condition) -> CCMP #83089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement parity for RAF and RDC attributes in NativeAOT #83085
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] cleanup before memory snapshot #83082
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [runtime/6.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83079
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [runtime/7.0] [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #83078
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • WIP reworked how the demotion logic should work in process_remaining_regions #83076
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #83060
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.16
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #83059
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.5

Merged

  • get transport MsQuic for Windows arm64 #83104
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • fix failing ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapleOcsp failures #83013
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Separate the generation of PerfMap and JitDump files #82142
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Change the ComInterfaceGenerator to output source in one file per interface and use file-scoped types #83055
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Some minor cleanup post the addition of TYP_SIMD64 and ZMM support - P1 #83044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use more traditional interface implementation + delegation for generator unit tests #83057
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Improve EqualityComparer for NativeAOT #83054
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename IntegralRange::IsPositive() to IsNonNegative to be accurate #83062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: profile synthesis consistency checking and more #83068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable GetAsync_ManyDifferentResponseHeaders_ParsedCorrectly … #83090
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add narrow methods to PackedSimd #83084
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • fix QUIC_STATUS in macOS #83011
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Make open method resolver pay for play #83064
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ifdef out a piece of unreachable reflection stack #83067
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Emit leaner cctor context for preinitialized types #83065
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve perf of CharEnumerator #82990
    area-System.Runtime
  • [NativeAOT] Experiment: Cache location of unwind sections #82994
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow devirtualizing more interface calls #82927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid generic virtual methods in enum infrastructure #83063
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't generate unused imports in jiterpreter traces #83061
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Make ComWrappersUnwrapper public in test assembly #83046
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Switch to selfhosted NativeAOT compiler #81205
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81283
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Resources, 7.0.x
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #81722
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Lowering subset of Vector512 methods for avx512. #82953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Overflow check optimizations for division #82924
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use libc directly for math in the jiterpreter, implement more opcodes #82963
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Ensure that the new Vector512 related ISAs are covered by ILLink Substitutions #83040
    linkable-framework
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fold string fields in structs stored in static readonly fields #80431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: For linux, run AOT smoke tests with the EAT build #82570
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasi] Fixes to enable more tests #82966
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][arm64] Implement delegate virtual invoke trampolines. #83028
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use latest sdk 7.0 sdk for workload testing, and perf runs #82219
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Backport #82480 (fix third argument to TypedArray.fill) #82572
    api-approved, arch-wasm
  • Remove fragile NGen logic for precomputed hashcodes #82563
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [browser] legacy JS interop optional via WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop - managed #82826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BLK and TYP_LCLBLK #83036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add switch for trim out ConfigurationManager support #83023
    area-System.Configuration, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [7.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82246
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 7.0.5
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [6.0] Check for pending IO in the portable thread pool's worker threads #82248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix pthread_cond_wait race on macOS #82893
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.5
  • Refactoring GenTreeVecCon to support TYP_SIMD64 #83053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add tests for build with SIMD disabled #82845
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to System.Drawing.Common.dll #82839
    area-System.Drawing
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate info code #83030
    NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Rename cgroup.cpp to cgroupcpu.cpp #83029
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] new EmccAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Use Vector128 and Vector256 in interface cast #83000
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • #78303 Draft: Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.BitCast #82917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
